login.signInYourSession: Sign in to start your session

uploader.message: This function is only available on the desktop. Please switch to desktop to continue.
uploader.audioDes: Audio files must be WAV or MP3 320kbps
uploader.videoDes: Video files must be MP4 minimum resolution 1920x1080
uploader.selectLabel: Select a label to upload to
uploader.dropZoneTrack: Drop some tracks on to the Drop Zone below
uploader.audioFilesMust: Audio files must be in MP3 320kbps
uploader.videoFilesMust: Video files must be in MP4 1080p
uploader.tracksBecomeVisibe: Please allow up to 10 minutes after publishing for your tracks to appear site wide.
uploader.nowClickOnTheFiles: Now click on the files that say "Needs Prep" and fill in the information  required for each to be published on CrookynClan. Media files will not go  into our system unless they meet the requirements above.
uploader.infoBelowIsAutomatically: Info below is automatically written by our system
uploader.claimSamplesTheVersionsDoNotMatter: CLAIM SAMPLES: The versions do not matter, we need the Artist and Title  EXACTLY how it's listed on the originals for each original used to make this media file.
uploader.claimAll: Claim all original works contained within this audio or video file by clicking on the button below and locating the original works within Spotify or YouTube and adding them to the sample list. Only check 'Track Is Original' if you created the track yourself and there are no available versions of this track on any of the above mentioned platforms.
uploader.whichCategory: Which category would you say this track fits best? We know a track could fit best in different situations but tell us which category suits it best in your mind.
uploader.doThisPartCorrectly: Do this part correctly to spare yourself any copyright infringement grief. Add the original work to each of the search engines
uploader.searchForTheOriginal: Original Work: (Search for the original work on Youtube, Spotify by typing the original title into each of the search boxes. IF you are uploading a DJ Mix be sure to name all the titles in the mix.)
uploader.CanFindATrack: Can't find a track in any of the search engines? Add the track manually.
uploader.fillOutAllRequired: Fill out all required fields to publish your media
uploader.useTheTrackEditor: Use the track editor to create a snippet file that highlights the part of your track you want to be played when people click "play". Snippets can be either 30, 60, 90 seconds, or a full-length lower quality snippet will be used for "Entire Track"
uploader.errorSaveSnippet: We're working on an improvement for Video upload. Please come back later. Thank you for your patience!
uploader.messageSnippet: Please choose time to save snippet.

createPost.mediaRepliesAreForUsers: (Media replies are for users replying to this post that want to add their own media to their reply. It can be free, or offered for a token cost per media reply)

createPost.youMayNotDelete: You may not delete a post that has ever had 'Paid Media Replies' turned on

editor.checkOut: Check out the fresh sounds of Bon Jovi with this brand new heater he cooked up for you! DJ's this one is dance floor ready, waste no time!!

myRelease.addReleaseDes1: (Choose tracks from your track library to meet the requirement)
myRelease.addReleaseDes2: to add them to the release. Drag and drop the tracks to rearrange the order)

myRelease.messageDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this track?

myPlaylist.description: Playlists are tracks you think belong together in a list for whatever reason you see fit pretty much. Be creative with your playlist ideas and maybe they can become CrooklynClan Featured Playlists!
myPlaylist.descriptionType: Public playlists are available for all users of cast dj to view. Private Playlists are only available to your followers to see.
myPlaylist.addYourTracksDes: (select tracks to add to this playlist)

modalPost.youWantDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this
modalPost.replyType: Posts may not be deleted that have “Paid Media Replies” turned on

cashouts.atTheCurrent: At the current moment our "cash out" feature is only available to those with a valid Paypal account.
cashouts.toCashout: To cash out means to exchange your tokens for their current token value in $USD. When requesting a cash out, a code will be sent to your registered email address and you will need to have access to it. Once you provide the access code the system will process your cash out in real time transferring the funds to your Paypal account.
cashouts.letTask: Let's take a look at the Cash Out Module
cashouts.module: The Cash Out module can be found in the "My Transactions" section nested in the "Cash Out" tab.
cashouts.blance: Displays the number of tokens you own.
cashouts.remaining: Displays the number of Cash Outs remaining in the current billing cycle.
cashouts.value: Displays the current value of a token.
cashouts.token: Displays the number of tokens you have entered in the Cash Out Input Field.
cashouts.paypal: Displays the amount of money you will receive via Paypal (minus Paypal fees).

playlistHelp.playlist: Playlists are a bunch of tracks you put in a list. They can be in that list for whatever reason you think they should, it's your Playlist, theme it how you please.
playlistHelp.consist: Playlists consist of tracks by any user within the entire CrooklynClan environment. Full tracks are not used in playlists. The preview snippet tracks that were created by the track contributor is what will be heard when playing a track in a playlist.
playlistHelp.canHelp: Playlists can have up to 4 owners and each of the owners will have equal permission for that playlist. No one owner is more powerful than the other, each can add and remove tracks, and each can edit the playlist details.
playlistHelp.better: The better question is why not bother? Playlists are a way to show gratitude to other users of CrooklynClan by showing them you support their work. Playlists are also a way to earn tokens if you become popular and your playlists have many users following them.
playlistHelp.tryMaking: Try making a playlist by selecting tracks you like, and give it a theme, some dope artwork, and think about how useful it can be to another DJ looking for guidance on what to play in a certain setting. The friends we make here are friends we have stuff in common with, so do your best to provide a service of some sort to your fellow CrooklynClan users!

releaseHelp.release: A "Release" is like a "Pack" or "Album" or "Bunch" (that's bananas ain't it :))
releaseHelp.users: Users of CrooklynClan can create releases out of tracks and videos they upload into the system. Users can set a token price for a release that offers a discount for those that purchase the entire release instead of just some individual tracks.
releaseHelp.mayAlso: Users may also set individual tracks to "RELEASE ONLY" in which case that track will still show up in charts, searches, and in the table results, but will not be purchasable stand alone. Clicking the token for a Release Only track will take the user to the tracks template page and display the releases the track is available in.
releaseHelp.takeALot: Take a look at this "Release Only" track.
releaseHelp.releaseOnly: Release Only tracks brandish a "Release Only" banner above the track controls on the upper right, as well as a red "R" inside the purchase token. Clicking either the banner or token will show you the releases the track is available within.
releaseHelp.editor: Releases are a great way for "Editors" to create "DJ Packs" that contain a lot of tracks that fit a theme and all have the same type of attributes (ie. Quick Hits, Acapella In's, Acapella Out's, etc..). Get creative and give it a try!

labelHelp.divider: CrooklynClan is divided into sections so that other companies such as DJ Pools & Record Labels can have a dedicated set of contributors, users, audio & video files, and more..
labelHelp.eachSection: Each section has a name, logo, description, it's own token split for all items sold within, its own users, and a lot more.
labelHelp.whenAUser: When a user has access to multiple sections on CrooklynClan they will have the ability to decide which section each upload is being sent to. Users may only feature a digital product in a single section of CrooklynClan at any one time.
labelHelp.noTrack: No track can be available in more than one section.
labelHelp.qualify: To qualify for a section, a user must be on the Boss Mode tier.
labelHelp.section: Sections are selectable throughout the CrooklynClan environment via our search and filtering tools. You may also view our dedication page for "Sections" to see who's on board, and what they are all about.

tierHelp.everyMember: Every member that signs up for CrooklynClan is automatically on our Free Tier. You can see all of the tiers available by clicking Services in the navigation bar.
tierHelp.letTake: Let's take a look at Tiers:
tierHelp.storage: This is storage for your audio and video media files. Each A/V Slot is good for a single upload of 250mb or less. If an upload exceeds 250mb it will take up an additional A/V slot and so on. So a 1 gig video would take up 4 A/V Slots.
tierHelp.asYou: As your subscription tier goes up, so do the amount of A/V Slots included with your subscription. If you are happy with your current subscription but just want to have more media in your section available you can purchase additional A/V Slots as an add-on to your current subscription tier. There are many ways to create your comfort zone.
tierHelp.plain: Plain and simple, it's dope. Having one should feel like a necessity in no time :)
tierHelp.takeALook: Take a look at a user profile!
tierHelp.paypal: Paypal users can cash their tokens out for US dollars. As the subscription tiers progress, the amount of real-time cash outs you can perform per 30 day period increases.
tierHelp.aNote: a note about cash outs: The value of a CrooklynClan Token fluctuates between $0.40 and $0.50 cents. It pays to watch the value of a Token before submitting a cash out to make sure you are getting the most money for your tokens.
tierHelp.forALimitTime: What it's all about folks. FOR A LIMITED TIME, Free tier members are getting 10% monetization. Pay nothing monthly, keep 10% of all the tokens you earn!
tierHelp.theToken: The Token Monetization Percentage (or TMP) is the percentage of tokens you keep when you receive them for media purchases and for the various other services you may provide. The user's TMP on the receiving end is always applied for all token transactions.
tierHelp.lowest: Our lowest paid subscription tier starts at 50% Token monetization on our top paid subscription tier offers a whopping 90%!
tierHelp.find: Find a comfort zone, see how many tokens you are making and decide when its time to get more of the pie and up your subscription tier!!

timlineHelp.timeline: Our Timeline makes us stand out.
timlineHelp.likeOther: Like other popular social media apps, this one has Followers & Following, a "Wall", a "Timeline", and some other neat stuff that NONE of those other popular social media apps possess.
timlineHelp.slot: Ad Slots may also be bought out for the guaranteed promotion you need without worry!! The buyout price for an ad slot is listed on the slot!
timlineHelp.user: A user may bid on as many ad slots that are available
timlineHelp.castDj: At CrooklynClan the ads you see running in the main ad spinner at the top of most pages throughout the app are completely user controlled. 20 ads can fit in the ad spinner at one time and the ads change every 24 hours.

tokenHelp.token: Tokens are the CrooklynClan economy. Users purchase tokens which they use to pay for the various services available throughout the CrooklynClan environment. Whether it's buying a track or video, tipping a streamer, or even buying a hat or shirt on CrooklynClan it's all done with TOKENS!
tokenHelp.user: Users of CrooklynClan earn tokens for providing various services to other users of the CrooklynClan application. You could be providing audio or video tracks, live DJ, Dance, or other types of performances, live tutoring, and much more, it's really up to your imagination how you earn using CrooklynClan.
tokenHelp.castDj: CASTDJ FOR DJ SERVICES, RECORD LABELS, & MORE!
tokenHelp.provider: CrooklynClan provides a pleasant and unique environment for digital product delivery and compensation (to put it lightly). Our higher end tiers make it possible for other services to profitably create their own special section on
tokenHelp.pool: CrooklynClan! Established DJ Pools like The Crooklyn Clan Vault, and i12inch Digital Pool are among some of the DJ services that are already on board!
tokenHelp.having: Having the ability to watch your audio and video files up to the minute for each and every download they receive is how it should be on all music services. Waiting months to find out how many downloads you have on your songs, plus following a trail of "expenses" and clauses can suck the fun right out of your craft.
tokenHelp.promise: We promise you, CrooklynClan is the most transparent service you will ever see. Tokens always have a value based on how many are being purchased and cashed out, and you always know that value at all times, in real time.
tokenHelp.our: Our percentage split with each CrooklynClan user extends from 10% User / 90% CrooklynClan on our "Free" tier to a whopping 90% User / 10% Cast DJ on our "Boss Mode" tier! See how well you perform with us and move up the tiers as you see fit!

trackHelp.file: Tracks are put into the CrooklynClan system using the uploader. A track can be an audio or video file.
trackHelp.every: Everything goes into the system as a track first. Whether or not the track is exclusively part of a release or not, it must go into the system as an individual item and all relevant data for the track must be filled out.
trackHelp.read: Read more about it in the Uploader section of this manual.
trackHelp.let: Let's take a closer look at a track..
trackHelp.provider: Provided during upload. If no artwork is provided the default artwork will be the contributors "square logo".
trackHelp.username: The username of the user that provided the track.
trackHelp.date: The date the track first goes live on CrooklynClan.
trackHelp.genreFor: There can be up to 2 but must be at least 1 genre for any track.
trackHelp.tagFor: There can be up to 10 tags associated with any track.
trackHelp.camelot: Is the Camelot and music key of the track.
trackHelp.theYear: Is the year the track came out publicly.
trackHelp.so: (So if you are creating an acapella intro edit of a classic 70's tune, the year would be the year the original came out, the release date is automatically populated with the date you release the track on CrooklynClan)
trackHelp.long: Is how long the track is.
trackHelp.banner: The banner(s) will describe a unique property about a track.
trackHelp.type: The filetype of the track is displayed as well.
trackHelp.playButton: The play button will load the track in the player and play it.
trackHelp.heart: The heart will add the track to your likes.
trackHelp.plus: The plus button lets you add the track to one of your playlists.
trackHelp.token: The token displays how many tokens it costs to download the track.

uploadHelp.castDj: The CrooklynClan Uploader is how you populate CrooklynClan with your media. The uploader will accept files in .wav, 320kbps MP3, and 1080p or better MP4 videos.
uploadHelp.take: Let's take a peak at the uploader and it's functionality.
uploadHelp.nowClick: Now click on the files that say "Needs Prep" and fill in the information required for each to be published on CrooklynClan. Media files will not go into our system unless they meet the requirements above.
uploadHelp.ourUpload: Our uploader will remember the media you dropped into it the next time you log in just in case you want to publish your media a little at a time.
uploadHelp.media: Media dropped onto the uploader will assume 1 of 3 statuses..
uploadHelp.thisMean: This means the file is missing data required to be added to our system. Clicking on the "Needs Prep" button will open the track editor so you can fill out the missing required information.
uploadHelp.required: This means all of the required metadata fields for this media file are completed and the file is ready to be published.
uploadHelp.file: This means the file does not meet the requirements for uploading to CrooklynClan.
uploadHelp.aLook: A look inside the Track Editor
uploadHelp.open: When opening a track that "Needs Prep" you will be greeted by a few sections asking you for some information about the track.
uploadHelp.drop: Drop a track image and be sure to follow the size guidelines so your artwork will appear nicely across the various sections of CrooklynClan. If no image is provided, CrooklynClan will use the contributors "Banner Image" as the track image.
uploadHelp.whatEver: Whatever the track or video is named.
uploadHelp.cameOut: The year the track came out. (Not to be confused with the CrooklynClan Release Date.)
uploadHelp.beats: The beats per minute or "tempo" of the track.
uploadHelp.tempo: If the track changes tempo and ends at a different tempo place the ending tempo here. If not leave it blank.
uploadHelp.dropDown: Use the dropdown and select some of our pre-defined tags, or give your track tags of your own. A track can have up to 10 tags.
uploadHelp.pickUp: Pick up to 2 but no less than 1 genre that fits this track best.
uploadHelp.section: If you are a CrooklynClan user with multiple section permissions use this dropdown to define what section the track is going to.
uploadHelp.price: The price in tokens you want to charge for this track. When entering a number here, a conversion tool will show you how much in USD the amount of tokens converts to at the current time.
uploadHelp.mandatory: Mandatory you let us and the rest of the users know if the track or video is explicit.
uploadHelp.remix: If this is an original work that is not a remix with samples of other people's work check the box.
uploadHelp.box: If an original track has even 1 identifiable sample then check this box.
uploadHelp.show: Show and hide this track from the public with this checkbox.
uploadHelp.claim: CLAIM SAMPLES: The versions do not matter, we need the Artist and Title EXACTLY how it's listed on the originals for each original used to make this media file.
uploadHelp.part: (Do this part correctly to spare yourself any copyright infringement grief. Add the original work to each of the search engines)
uploadHelp.work: Original Work: (Search for the original work on Spotify, Apple Music, Tidal, Beatport, and others by typing the original title into each of the search boxes. IF you are uploading a DJ Mix be sure to name all the titles in the mix.)
uploadHelp.break: If your track is an unofficial remix, party break, dj pool edit, or has samples be sure to list them here. List the artist and title of each sample in a track and hit "add" after each one. Doing this is important and keeps you within the boundaries of our terms of service and membership agreement.
uploadHelp.edit: (Use the track editor to create a snippet file that highlights the part of your track you want to be played when people click "play". Snippets can be either 30, 60, 90 seconds, or a full-length lower quality snippet will be used for "Entire Track")
uploadHelp.lasty: Lastly, you will create a snippet for your track. Snippets are the version users hear when they listen to your tracks on CrooklynClan. You decide how long you want your snippet to be based on our available length selections.
uploadHelp.move: Move the time container to the desired part and click "save snippet". You can always change your snippet later if you feel like you may have missed a better part of your track to display.
uploadHelp.display: All snippets are created at 128kbps MP3 quality to protect your original files from unauthorized downloading.

optionCreate.title: Title
optionCreate.isGreaterThanOrEqualTo: is greater than or equal to
optionCreate.isLowerThanOrEqualTo: is lower than or equal to

homePage.title: Welcome
homePage.trackWeThink: Tracks we think you should be paying attention to!
homePage.packWeThink: Releases we think you should be paying attention to!
homePage.playlistText: Playlists designed to keep you on your A Game!

cashOut.description: Enter a token amount in the box to see the cash out value. Click the 'Request CashOut' button when you are ready to cash out...
cashOut.inputTokenPlaceholder: Enter number of tokens you want to cashout

setUsername.title: Set your username
setUsername.description: Please enter your username to complete your account.

a/vSlots.a/vSlotsTitle: 1 A/V SLOT = 1 audio or video upload at a file size of 256mb or less
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsContent: A/V Slots are included in all monthly recurring subscription Tiers.
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsDescription: The A/V Slot amount that comes with your subscription Tier can be considered your max uploads per subscription period (30 days).
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsValue: Every audio or video product you upload to CrooklynClan requires at a minimum, 1 A/V slot to store that product.
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsSingle: A single A/V Slot can hold up to 256mb file size. If a file size exceeds 256mb it will take up an additional A/V Slot.
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsConsume20MB: A 20MB file upload would consume 1 A/V Slot.
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsConsume1GB: A 1GB file upload would consume 4 A/V Slots.
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsBalance: Your A/V Slot balance refreshes each subscription period (30 day intervals)
a/vSlots.a/vSlotsUse: When uploading audio and video tracks to CrooklynClan, our uploader will let you know how many A/V Slots each file will consume. If you are falling short of A/V Slots and want to upload more products on a monthly basis you may either change your subscription Tier to one that comes with more A/V Slots, or you can come to this section to purchase a monthly-recurring A/V Slot add-on which will raise your monthly A/V Slots by the amount shown.

tiers.teirsStart: Everyone starts off on the "Free Tier" when your email address is confirmed.
tiers.teirsOnOur: On our Free Tier you will have the ability to upload up to 10 audio or video tracks in to the CrooklynClan Music Pool per subscription Tier period (that's every 30 days from the start of your Tier subscription). The CrooklynClan Music Pool is our entry level "Label", loaded with edits, remixes, original works, mashups, and more from our CrooklynClan users.
tiers.teirsFreeTierUser: Free Tier users will also earn a 10% token monetization on all sales of their tracks.
tiers.teirsSoPay: So pay nothing monthly and still earn tokens that can be converted to real money.
tiers.teirsTheFree: The Free Tier will tell you if you have what it takes to upgrade to a paid Tier and boost up your earnings.
tiers.teirsAsCastDJ: As a CrooklynClan Free Tier subscriber you are not obligated to upload tracks.
tiers.teirsThereNo: There is no further obligation to use the service as freely as you'd like including buying tokens and using them to purchase any of the various audio or video tracks, or services throughout the application.
tiers.teirsTokensMayBe: Tokens may be converted to $USD via PayPal. A user will have the option to "Cash Out" when their token balance is equal to $50.00USD or more.
tiers.teirsWhenUser: When a user purchases tokens from CrooklynClan in the form of a Token Package, the amount of tokens they purchased are considered "Purchased Tokens".
tiers.teirsUserMayNot: Users may not request a Cash Out for Purchased Tokens.
tiers.teirsTheCashOut: The Cash Out option will not be available unless your “Earned Tokens” balance = 5000 or more.
tiers.teirsForUsers: For users that would like to treat CrooklynClan as a business, you may upgrade to one of the available monthly recurring subscription Tiers. Each subscription Tier offers a higher token split %, more monthly A/V Slots for uploads, additional Labels to upload your tracks into, and more.
tiers.teirsSeeEach: See each subscription Tier details for more information about that Tier.

tokens.descriptionToken: Every track has a token value. When you purchase a track the token value amount of that track is subtracted from your token balance.
tokens.contentToken: When the transaction is complete, the high quality, full-length version of the track becomes available to you in your Library as a download.
tokens.valuesToken: Tracks may also be purchased using a Star. When you purchase a track using a star the token cost of the track is bypassed and 1 star is taken from your star balance for the track.
tokens.tokenValue: Some of our token packages come with stars.
tokens.tokenTracks: - Tracks purchased with stars are purchased one track at a time, one star at a time.
tokens.tokenRelease: - Release discounts do not apply to stars and Releases may not be purchased using stars.
tokens.tokenUse: - Tracks that are listed as "Release Only" may not be purchased using stars.
tokens.tokenNotification: Some of our token packages come with stars.

changePassword.validatePassword: Password must be at least 8 characters

deleteAccount.advice: Before deleting you account, you must cancel your subscription.
deleteAccount.previousPurchases: All previous purchases will no longer be accessible.
deleteAccount.records: All records of all transactions will no longer be available.
